response.overview: Ee Vayasu Inthe is a tale of greed, lust and haste among youth. Seenu is a high school student who is a topper of his class. He falls for his schoolmate Jyothi who expects him to buy expensive gifts. Meanwhile, Krishna, a jobless and careless young man tries to woo Jyothi and succeeds. This results in the rivalry between Seenu and Krishna, but they donâ€™t know what Jyothi has in store for them.
response.title: Ee Vayasu Inthe
